de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.session

Interface ImSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcSession, ImvSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDefaultImSession, DefaultImcSession, DefaultImvSession

    interface ImSession
    Generic session base. The session manages an IM(C/V) connection and is used to communicate thru the underlying connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getConnectionState()

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionState

        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getConnectionState()
        Returns the current connection state. (e.g. closed)
        Returns:
        the connection state.

      • setConnectionState

        void setConnectionState(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState imConnectionState)
        Sets the connection state to a new state.
        Parameters:
        imConnectionState - the new state

      • triggerMessage

        void triggerMessage(ImMessageTriggerEnum trigger)
                    throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Requests integrity measurement messages. Based on the current state of the message retrieval (e.g. handshake begin, batch end).
        Parameters:
        trigger - the message retrieval state
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if message retrieval fails

      • handleMessage

        <T extends ImObjectComponent> void handleMessage(T component)
                   throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Handles integrity measurement component messages and returns a response if necessary.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the component representation type
        Parameters:
        component - the component message
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if message handling fails

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        Terminates the session.
